sections.title: sketch
sections.description: Ideas spring up in unexpected places and situations. Given its transient nature, they tend to get lost or forgotten over time. Sketching establishes a mindset for spontaniety, where I help you nurture ideas, assimilate them, and converge on a central concept and build further.

sections.title: design
sections.description: The sketching phase helps to map out prototypes. As details are etched out for user flow, new insights come into the fore that restrict user decision-making to achieve objectives. These are resolved in this phase at a cheaper cost for time and energy.

sections.title: build
sections.description: I use ReactJS and NextJS to design the front-end. I focus on fuctionality to achieve user objective before implementing visual design elements - the wow factor! At the end of this, I hand you a fully functional front-end with APIs that is optimized for web performance.

liveProjects.title: HandForHandmade
liveProjects.description: Pan-India discovery platform which brings artisans, designers and various organizations to enable business collaborations to sustain artisan livelihood

section.description: After an initial discussion, a rough layout was sketched out and developed user flows for a mobile device on Figma. It wasn't detailed, but provided clarity and context for brainstorming and gained further insights to identify necessary features that were missing.

The color schemes were developed based on the logo color and its contrast colors with various hues.  The different hues of the logo and contrast colors were combined and shown to the client to choose from
